overview: L'Arbre de la Vie is, first of all, a summer trip to the island of Sifnos, Greece, then, in Paris, the film shows the preparations for the shooting of my new film, The Adventures of Eddie Turley, with Philip Dubuquoy, Françoise Michaud, Joël Barbouth, Joseph Morder and Gérard Tallet.
title: L'Arbre de la Vie
